Cashback for hospital mcc:a) SCB manhatten world/platinum 3% for max $6667 in a quarter. But provided you already have the card  it is not open for application.b) BoC family card 3% for max $833.33 each monthc) HSBC advance 2.5% capped for max $2800d) Maybank platinum visa for $30/$100/$200 quarterly rebate if $300/$1000/$2000 spending posted in each and every of the 3 calendar months in the calendar quarter.e) Maybank Barcelona 1.6% unlimitedf) Amex True cashback for 1.5% unlimitedMiles:General spending card from Amex/scb/maybankCan also earn sign-up bonus for new card application from these banks if meet spending requirements.
